MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AIWolfRuntimeException class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
